content.prompt:
Listen to the excerpt.

The score is printed correctly but in the recording you hear there is an error in pitch that creates a voice leading error. Which of the following voice-leading errors occurs?

choices.label: The chordal seventh is approached by a descending leap.
The chordal seventh is approached by an ascending leap.
The chordal seventh is resolved down by a leap.
The chordal seventh is resolved up by a leap.

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Apply knowledge of musical symbols and terms to detect discrepancies in pitch and rhythm when comparing notated and performed music in one or two voices.
